description:
They’ve both got demanding careers but Miranda Kerr and Orlando Bloom made sure to take some time out for themselves on Monday. 他们各自都有事业要忙，但是米兰达·可儿和奥兰多·布鲁姆一定要在周一抽出时间共度温馨时光。
The Australian supermodel and her actor husband enjoyed a walk with their adorable two-year-old son Flynn in New York, where Orlando is currently treading the boards on in Romeo & Juliet on Broadway.这位澳大利亚超模和她的演员丈夫带着他们两岁的可爱儿子弗林漫步在纽约的大街上，奥兰多最近在纽约百老汇出演《罗密欧与茱丽叶》。

Both A-listers dressed down for their day out while little Flynn was the most stylish of them all, clad in a leather jacket and turn up jeans with blue trainers.这两位一线明星今天出街都穿的很随意，儿子弗林则穿着皮夹克，牛仔裤配蓝色运动鞋潮味十足。
The production of Romeo and Juliet, starring Bloom and Condola Rashad recently opened to mixed reviews. 由奥兰多·布鲁姆和康朵拉·拉莎德主演的《罗密欧与茱丽叶》，近来获得的评价褒贬不一。

title: 奥兰多•布鲁姆夫妇携子甜蜜出街
